text: Aug 12 Brazilian cosmetics company Natura & Co , owner of Avon and The Body Shop, reported on Thursday a second-quarter profit of 235 million reais, reversing a loss from a year earlier, thanks to e-commerce and integration with Avon.The companys recurring earnings before interest, taxes, depreciation and amortization (EBITDA) fell 3.4% to 630 million reais. (Reporting by Jimin Kang and Alberto Alerigi Jr Editing by Chris Reese)
